connect.description: Connect with me on LinkedIn for professional networking.

projects.title: LinkedLift – AI-Powered LinkedIn Optimizer
projects.description: An AI tool that takes your resume and generates a high-impact LinkedIn headline and About section, designed to boost search visibility and personal branding.

projects.title: No-BS Compare – Honest Product Comparison with LLMs
projects.description: A no-fluff product comparison tool that asks clarifying questions and uses LLMs to return structured, unbiased comparisons of items—no affiliate gimmicks or ad-driven results.

projects.title: Sales Call Analysis with LLM
projects.description: Advanced AI system that analyzes sales calls using Large Language Models to extract insights, sentiment, and key conversation points for sales optimization.

projects.title: Style My Avatar - AI Avatar Generator
projects.description: AI-powered avatar generation platform that creates personalized avatars using advanced generative models and style transfer techniques.

projects.title: Customer Comment/Review Analysis with LLM
projects.description: Intelligent system for analyzing customer feedback using LLMs to extract sentiment, themes, and actionable insights.

projects.title: Talent Scout - AI Agent
projects.description: AI-powered recruitment agent that automatically screens candidates, analyzes resumes, and matches talent with job requirements.

projects.title: Youtube Video to Blog Generator
projects.description: Automated content creation tool that converts YouTube videos into well-structured blog posts using AI transcription and summarization.

projects.title: LinkedIn Activity to Heatmap Generator
projects.description: Data visualization tool that converts LinkedIn activity data into interactive heatmaps for professional network analysis.

projects.title: Preferential Voting Visualiser
projects.description: Interactive web application that visualizes preferential voting systems and election results with dynamic charts and analytics.

projects.title: Australian Pay Calculator
projects.description: Comprehensive salary calculator for Australian tax system with superannuation, HECS, and various deduction calculations.

projects.title: Working Day Calculator
projects.description: Business day calculator that accounts for public holidays, weekends, and custom business rules across different regions.

projects.title: ASVSpoof Research
projects.description: Research thesis on automatic speaker verification spoofing detection using deep learning and signal processing techniques.

projects.title: Effects of OUD Research
projects.description: Research paper analyzing the effects of Opioid Use Disorder using machine learning models and statistical analysis.
